Can't launch. Transfers me to Magicka steam page. Where's the problem?

AFAIK cracked version does not allow co-op or online play.

To get that just:
1.) Install the game (do NOT crack it)
2.) Install latest update (also NO cracks)
3.) Create "steam_appid.txt" in the root folder of the game
4.) Type "73050" into the .txt file, save and exit.
5.) Restart your steam
6.) Enjoy online and co-op gameplay

Note: Do not download steam demos nor try to add game into steam library as non-steam game. Simply download and install skidrow version of the game with latest update, do not crack it, restart steam and run the game. Worked for me, should work for you too.

Last tested on Update 7 and worked flawlessly for me.

If you have problems with black screen on startup:

1. Uninstall ALL NET Frameworks 3.5 or lower
2. Install fresh Framework 3.5
